sys_documentation.help: A Injuries that can be treated by the local First Aider from First Aid box B Minor non-disabling injury requiring professional medical advice C Serious injury or acute illness resulting in temporary disability D Permanent disability, loss of body part and/or chronic illness E Death
sys_documentation.hint: A Injuries that can be treated by the local First Aider from First Aid box B Minor non-disabling injury requiring professional medical advice C Serious injury or acute illness resulting in temporary disability D Permanent disability, loss of body part and/or chronic illness E Death
sys_documentation.label: Severity
